recipesJson.name: Pebble Peach Tea (Snapple)
recipesJson.author: gEEx354
recipesJson.description:
RF SC Sweet Tea is not added to ATF yet...sweet potatoe pie is in its place.
This is a Peach tea inspired by Snapple the best stuff on EARTH! I am using RF SC Sweet Tea as the base note With peaches in the middle and foreground.
You can add koolada or other cooling agents to your desired taste..
This recipe was for the most part thrown together.. I know jF honey Peach and PUR White Peach pretty well and this is my best combination with RF SC Sweet Tea- enjoy!!!

Feel free to adapt and go wild!!!!!
